questions.question: Who is Alan Turing?
questions.answer: He is considered the father of theoretical computer science and AI.

questions.question: What is the Dartmouth Conference?
questions.answer: The term 'Artificial Intelligence' was coined at this conference in 1956.

questions.question: Who is Deep Blue?
questions.answer: This chess computer defeated World Champion Garry Kasparov in 1997.

questions.question: What is AlphaGo?
questions.answer: This AI system by DeepMind mastered the game of Go.

questions.question: What is an AI Winter?
questions.answer: This period of reduced funding and interest in AI occurred several times in history.
